altTitles.ja: メダリスト

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

title.en: Asobinin wa Kenja ni Tenshoku Dekiru tte Shittemashita? ~ Yuusha Party o Tsuihou Sareta Lv 99

altTitles.es: ¿Sabías que un donjuán puede cambiar su trabajo por el de un sabio? El bufón del nivel 99 expulsado de la party de los héroes, se convertirá en un "gran sabio".

altTitles.en: Did You Know That a Playboy Can Change His Job to a Sage? ~The Level 99 Jester Expelled from the Heroes' Party Will Become a 'Great Sage'~

altTitles.ru: Знаете ли вы, что бездельник может стать мудрецом? — Шут 99-го уровня, исключенный из отряда героев, достиг звания «Великого мудреца»

altTitles.ja: 遊び人は賢者に転職できるって知ってました？　～勇者パーティを追放されたLV99道化師、【大賢者】になる～

altTitles.ko: 광대는 현자로 전직할 수 있다는 걸 알고 계셨나요?

altTitles.zh: 知道遊人可以轉職成賢者嗎？ ～被勇者隊伍放逐的LV99道化師將會成為【大賢者 】～

description.en:
The Jester ―― More commonly known as the ‘Playboy’ Dylan, was fired from the party of the Heroes. The self-centred Heroes didn’t understand Dylan’s importance to the group.  
  
They were just a group of one-man teams. Not interested in cooperation at all. Any failures are blamed on the jester. Dylan, who was disgusted with such companions and was sick of playing as their comedic foil, happily accepted being kicked out.  
  
The Heroes didn’t know. After saving them many times over with his magic tricks, the level 99 jester can change his job title to that of a ‘Great Sage’.  
  
“Life, how about a rewrite?”  
  
He’s done being the clown. From here on out, he’s going to take the leading role.

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.tl: Sa isang partikular na paaralan ay may isang natatanging klab at ang tatlong tagapamahala nito. Bagama't hindi kapansin-pansin, ay nagsimula na ang mga araw na kahit saan ay hindi matatagpuan! Iginuhit ni Souichiro Yamamoto, ay isang bagong kuwento ng mga kabataan sa larangan ng isports!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.en: To the Abandoned Sacred Beasts

altTitles.ja: かつて神だった獣たちへ

description.en:
In war, men become beasts. War makes gods out of beasts. When war ends… where do the gods go? Where can they rest their weary heads?  
  
Wolves walk the forest of despair, the wasteland of lamentation, the sea of bitterness, in the time of dark and light. To kill those that were once their friends.  

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/803-to-the-abandoned-sacred-beasts?utm_source=mgd)

altTitles.en: One Piece - Digital Colored Comics
One Piece

altTitles.ja: ONE PIECE カラー版

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως ο «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

altTitles.ja: ラジエーションハウス

description.en: A new milestone in medical drama begins! A medical diagnosis mystery manga depicting the other side of medical care, the radiology department. Iori Igarashi is a talented radiology technician who has patiently waited for his chance to work with An Amakasu, his childhood friend. After being hired at her family's hospital, he is determined to fulfill a promise that he made with An when they were younger. Unfortunately, having been out of touch for years, she doesn't recognize him and it doesn't help that she also isn't a fan of the way he performs his duties. As all sorts of cases come into the department, she must acknowledge his skills and learn to work together so that patients can receive the best treatment possible. While the two of them adapt to each other, will An recognize her childhood friend, who has been working with her all this time?
description.es-la: ¡Resulta que no solo el médico general diagnostica nuestras enfermedades! Hay médicos radiógrafos que investigan las causas y revelan las lesiones mediante rayos X o tomografía computarizada. Por no hablar de los radiólogos, que interpretan los escáneres y hacen los diagnósticos. Este 'diagnóstico de imagen' forma la base de la medicina moderna. Desde un lado del hospital que antes no se veía, donde los expertos combaten las enfermedades y las lesiones, te traemos 'Radiation House'. ¡Comienza un nuevo hito en el drama médico!

altTitles.en: Emperor and the Female Knight
The King and His Knight

altTitles.ja: 皇帝と女騎士

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế và Nữ hiệp sĩ

description.en:
Pollyanna is an unremarkable girl in a noble family. Her parents send her to military conscription hoping she'll die quickly in battle. Left only with her wits and her strength, Pollyanna fights to rise up in the ranks. One day, she meets an ardent king, one who finally acknowledges her worth. Moved by his dream for unity, Pollyanna vows to fight for him. But now the young king is slowly realizing this stalwart knight has also conquered his heart.

---
After six years of pointless war between her country, the Kingdom of Ehas, and their neighbor enemies, the Kingdom of Cukda, aged 20, the woman soldier and former petty officer Pauliana Kellenbell has been defeated and captured in a storming attack by the army of another enemy nation, the Kingdom of Acrea, an attack she had personally predicted but fell on deaf ears by her superiors. She has been desperately trying to survive in men's society, but it was all in vain, her noble birthright having been taken away by her family by being sent to war, and having all her efforts crushed down by the fact that she's a woman in the all-male army of Ehas.

Acrea's young king, Lucius, sees her struggle and potential, and makes an unexpected offer. He dreams of becoming the first emperor to conquer the South continent and its sea. Pauliana swears a life-long allegiance to Lucius for acknowledging her, becoming his knight and most trusted advisor, bestowing her with the name Pauliana Winter. However, in the end, Lucius is just an emperor on the battlefield that had awakened his love for Pauliana!

---

description.ja:
前妻との娘である「ポリアナ」は家族にとってただの邪魔もの――。
父はポリアナが戦死することを望み強制的に戦場に行かせるのだが…自分を見捨てた親への復讐と生き残るため必死に訓練し、疲弊した戦地の男世界でも耐えぬくポリアナ。
しかし、敵国の新王「ルクソス」が率いるアクレア軍の侵攻により、ポリアナは絶体絶命の危機に――!?
description.ko: “오늘따라 경이 귀여워 보이는구나.” “폐하, 어디 불편하십니까?” 미모와 능력을 갖춘 대륙의 패왕, 남자보다 거친 여기사에게 반하다?! 전우애가 연애로 발전하기까지, 진중함과 유머의 황금비로 풀어내는 새로운 스타일의 ‘여기사 로망’! 때는 전시, 여기사 폴리아나는 적국 아크레아의 군대에 패배한다. 그녀는 남자들의 사회에서 살아남기 위해 필사적으로 노력해 왔으나 이제는 허망히 죽을 신세. 하지만 아크레아의 젊은 왕 룩소스 1세는 그녀의 사투를 보고 뜻밖
description.tr: Pauliana, düşman ulus ordusu Acrea tarafından yenildi ve yakalandı. Umutsuzca erkekler toplumunda hayatta kalmaya çalışıyordu, ama hepsi boşunaydı. Acrea’nın genç kralı Lucius, mücadelesine tanık oldu ve beklenmedik bir teklifte bulundu. Onun hayali savaşı sürdürmek ve Güney kıtasını ve denizini fetheden ilk imparator olabilmekiti. Pauliana, Lucius’a, onu kabul ettiği için ömür boyu sürecek bir bağlılık sözü verdi. Ancak, sonunda, Lucius sadece Pauliana’ya olan sevgisini savaş alanında uyandırmiş bir imparatordu.
description.uk:
Пауліану подолали, і вона була захоплена у полон армією ворожої країни Акрії. Вона відчайдушно намагалася вижити в чоловічому товаристві, але все було марно. Молодий король Акрії, Люціус, побачив її боротьбу та зробив неочікувану пропозицію. Він мріє продовжити війну та стати першим імператором, що скорить Південний континент і море. Пауліана присягнула на вірність Люціусу за те, що він її визнав. Однак, зрештою, Люціус - просто імператор, який на полі бою усвідомив свої почуття до Пауліани.

---

description.en: On the Hawaiian Islands, siblings Dragona and Jodio Joestar commit petty crimes to provide aid for their ailing mother Barbara Ann. Under the orders of Meryl May Qi, both a crime lord and their high school principal, the siblings work alongside fellow teenagers Usagi Alohaoe and Paco Laburantes. Together, the gang engages in outright robbery, fraudulent activity, and other schemes to rip off unsuspecting tourists and civilians.  Fifteen-year-old Jodio admires his older brother's strong sense of identity and his mother's incredible work ethic, but there is a darkness within him, one characterized by violent outbursts that he carries out with a cold stoicism. Diagnosed as a sociopath, Jodio is quick to brutalize those who threaten his loved ones. His one objective is to make money by any means necessary, both to support his family and to become filthy rich in his own right.  On one particular heist, the gang robs manga artist Rohan Kishibe of a seemingly ordinary lava rock. However, they soon find that the rock draws any object of high value that it touches to its wielder, no matter the distance or bizarre chain of circumstances it takes to get there. With this new power in hand, Jodio and his allies set out to become wealthier than they ever dreamed possible.

altTitles.en: The Golden Experience Point

description.en:
The conquest story of the final boss protagonist begins here!

"Boot Hour, Shoot Curse" is a VRMMORPG that has no concept of levels or professions. Instead, players must farm experience points to gain new skills and increase their status.
Rare, a girl who participated in the closed beta test, has acquired the hidden skill "Subordinate", which allows her to turn NPCs into her subordinates. The skill also transfers the experience points gained by the subordinates to Rare.

She used the skill to gradually add new NPCs she encountered to her party. As a result of the unprecedented amount of experience gained from her minions, she was able to evolve into a Demon Lord.
description.fr:
L’histoire de la conquête du boss final commence ici !

« Boot Hour, Shoot Curse » est un VRMMORPG qui n’a ni de concept de niveaux ni de métiers. Au lieu de cela, les joueurs doivent accumuler des points d’expérience pour acquérir de nouvelles compétences et améliorer leur statut et leur personnage.
Rare, une jeune fille qui a participé aux tests de la version bêta fermée, a acquis la compétence cachée « Subordonné », qui lui permet de transformer des PNJ en ses subordonnés. Cette compétence transfère également les points d’expérience gagnés par les subordonnés à Rare.
Elle a utilisé cette compétence pour ajouter progressivement à son groupe de nouveaux PNJ qu’elle rencontrait. Et grâce à la quantité d’expérience accumulée par ses subordonnés, elle a pu devenir un Roi Démon
description.ja:
新作VRMMORPG『Boot hour, shoot curse』のオープンβテストに参加した主人公レアが手に入れたのは、隠しスキル『使役』。
ゲームならよくある【レベル】や【ジョブ】というシステムが存在しない代わりに、獲得した【経験値】を使ってスキルを取得したり、ステータスを上昇させたりするこのゲームにおいて、「眷属化したキャラの獲得経験値をすべて自分に集約する」という『使役』はとんでもないスキルだった。

レアは、『使役』を使って出会ったNPCや魔物を次々眷属化。増え続ける【経験値】で自身と配下を強化し続けた結果、いつの間にか「特定災害生物『魔王』」の判定を受けてしまい…!?

ラスボス級主人公によるVRMMO征服譚、ここに開幕!!

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Watashi no Kokoro wa Oji-san de Aru

altTitles.ja: 私の心はおじさんである

altTitles.en: My Heart Is an Old Man

description.es-la: "Haruka Yamagishi" es un tio que no tiene amigos ni familia y sólo va y viene entre el trabajo y su casa. Un día, cuando se despierta, se encuentra en un mundo diferente. Además, por alguna razón, ¡se ha convertido en una hermosa elfa oscura! Ahora, Haruka tiene un poder mágico inagotable, un cuerpo robusto y una nueva vida en la que puede hacer cualquier cosa....Sin embargo, a través de sus amigos que conoció y sus actividades como aventurera, poco a poco empezaron a surgir cambios.Al tio que renunció a la vida, en este mundo empieza a sentir lo que es vivir. Aunque hay algunas trampas y otros eventos, ¡Es una historia de aventuras conmovedora!

title.en: Tsuihousareta Renkinjutsushi wa Mujikaku ni Densetsu to Naru Yandere Imouto (Oukoku no Shugoryuu) to Issho ni Henkyou de Shiawase ni Kurashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師は無自覚に伝説となる ヤンデレ妹（王国の守護竜）と一緒に辺境で幸せに暮らします！

altTitles.en: The Exiled Alchemist Unwittingly Becomes a Legend Living Happily on the Frontier with his Yandere Sister (The Guardian Dragon of the Kingdom)!

description.id: Suatu hari, Mys, putra tertua dari Duke Windsor, dijatuhi hukuman oleh raja untuk diasingkan ke perbatasan. Raja mengklaim bahwa kunjungan rahasianya ke Valitra, naga terkuat yang melindungi kerajaan, merupakan usaha pengkhianatan terhadap kerajaan. Namun, naga penjaga Valitra sebenarnya adalah adiknya Meis, Tinny, yang dikira telah meninggal empat tahun lalu! “Mys Nii-sama adalah orang yang menyelamatkan hidupku, orang yang layak untuk memerintah segala sesuatu di dunia [Makhluk Tertinggi]. Siapapun yang menyakiti Mys Nii-sama akan ku lemparkan ke dalam neraka!” Dan Kerajaan sedang menuju kehancuran, setelah menimbulkan kemarahan naga pelindungnya, Valitra… Sementara itu, di perbatasan di mana Mys telah menjadi penguasa, teknik alkemisnya mengarah pada perkembangan yang belum pernah terjadi sebelumnya dan membuat semua orang bahagia – dan sekali lagi, kerajaan berada dalam bahaya kehancuran.
description.ja: まともな回復薬すら作れないことから、家族から無能扱いされていたウィンザー公爵家の長男・マイス。彼はある日、国王から辺境ベオグラードへの追放を言い渡されてしまう。王国を守るドラゴン【守護竜ヴァリトラ】のもとへ通っていたことが、王国への反逆に当たるというのだ。しかし実は、守護竜ヴァリトラの正体は4年前に死んだと思われていたマイスの妹ティニーであった――。「マイス兄様こそ私の命の恩人にして、この世のすべてを統べるに相応しい【至高にして至大であられるお方】です。マイス兄様を傷つける者は、この私が地獄に叩き落します！」

altTitles.en: Silver Coal

description.en: In a chaotic Joseon dynasty with vampires, ghosts, and shamans, Park Moon-soo, who calls himself a dark-speaker, destroys a corrupted official. In order to subdue the dark master Park Moon-soo, who is trying to revive the vampire king, the court dispatches Anson, a military officer who has just passed the exam, to find Hong Kil-dong, an outlaw who is good at swordsmanship and martial arts and dispatches him to Taebaek Mountain.
description.ko: 흡혈귀와 요괴, 무당이 창궐한 혼란의 조선, 자신을 암흑어사라 칭하는 박문수가 타락한 관아를 파괴하고 다닌다. 다급해진 조정에서는 흡혈귀 왕의 부활을 노리는 암흑어사 박문수를 토벌하라 명하기 위해 갓 무과에 급제한 무관 안손에게 도술과 무술에 능한 도적 홍킬동을 찾아오라 태백산으로 파견한다. <하이브>의 김규삼 작가가 선사하는 요괴 퇴마 개그 판타지 시대극!

title.en: Tomodachi ga Hoshikatta no de Akuma o Fukkatsu Sasemashita wa!

altTitles.ja: トモダチがほしかったので悪魔を復活させましたわ！

description.ja: かつて世界を混乱に陥れた大悪魔が美少女の姿で復活----！封印を解き目覚めさせたのは、ぼっちのシスターだった！？
description.es-la: El gran demonio Anri que una vez sumió al mundo en el caos, ha regresado en forma de ¿una niña?: ¿¡Acaso nos volvemos a encontrar mi némesis que me sello!? ¡¡Comienza un contrato malsano entre una hermana loli con problemas de comunicación y el digo ahora la chica demonio Anri!!

altTitles.en: Succubus Tamer no Isekai Musou: Maboro Shijuutachi no Chi wo Hiku Saikyou no Succubus to Hajimeru Mazoku Ryou Kaitaku

altTitles.ja: サキュバステイマーの異世界無双 ～幻獣たちの血を引く最強のサキュバスとはじめる魔族領開拓～

description.en: Malt Arcane is a "Tamer" whose ancestors are heroes of the human race. When Malt goes to defeat monsters, he is attacked by two low rank demon Succubi! When he activates his [Tame] skill on them, they both undergo a mysterious change... The Hero, now branded as a failure and exiled from his home, begins to explore the demon territory accompanied by the two Succubus, Filei and Miru...!
description.id:
Translated by SirenKomik.my.id
Malt Alcain, merupakan seorang “Tamer” yang memiliki garis keturunan dari Pahlawan Manusia. Saat sedang bertualang untuk menaklukkan monster, dia diserang oleh Succubus, iblis berpangkat rendah. Dia menggunakan skill “Taming” pada Succubus tersebut dan Succubus mengalami perubahan yang aneh… MC yang dianggap sebagai aib dan diusir dari negaranya, memulai eksplorasi bersama dua Succubus dan mengembangkan wilayah iblis…!!!
description.ja: 人族の英雄を先祖に持つ「テイマー」のマルト＝アルカイン。魔物討伐に向かったマルトは下位魔獣のサキュバスに襲われるが、スキル【テイム】を発動したしたことで、サキュバスに妖しい変化が…。出来損ないの烙印を押され国を追放された主人公が、２人のサキュバスと魔族領の開拓を始める…！！！

title.en: Sobodol - Yomei Wazuka no Obaa-chan, Wakagaette Mago to Idol ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 祖母ドル, 祖母ドル ～余命わずかのおばあちゃん、若返って孫とアイドルになる～

description.es-la: En medio de la vibrante escena idol japonesa, Hinami Shirogawa lucha por mantener el equilibrio entre su carrera en ascenso y la devoción incondicional de su abuela, Kiyora Kiyosumi. Un día, un inesperado giro del destino rejuvenece a Kiyora, quien decide unirse al grupo de idols de Hinami bajo una nueva identidad. Lo que sigue es una hilarante y conmovedora travesía donde la abuela, con su joven apariencia, intenta apoyar a su nieta desde dentro del mundo del espectáculo, creando situaciones cómicas y revelando secretos familiares. ¿Podrán mantener su identidad en secreto mientras persiguen sus sueños en el competitivo mundo de las idols? ¡Descúbrelo en esta fascinante historia llena de sorpresas y emociones!

title.en: "Saikyou Sutetasu" wo Hikitsuide Ningen ni Tensei Shita Kiyoshijuu Behemoth, Yuusha no Konnyakusha (Ohime-sama) wo Ukkari Netotte Shimau

altTitles.ja: ≪最強ステータス≫を引き継いで人間に転生した聖獣ベヒーモス、勇者の婚約者(お姫様)をうっかり寝取ってしまう

description.es-la: Soy Behemoth, la criatura más poderosa, reencarnado como humano por un motivo especial. El día de mi reencarnación, salvé la vida de una joven elfo. Esa misma noche... ¿me pidió que tuviera "relaciones" con ella...? Resulta ser la princesa de un reino... ¿qué debo hacer? La exitosa novela web de Nozomi Ginyoku, autor de "Soy un Monstruo de Rango S, Behemoth, pero me Confunden con un Gato y Vivo como un Caballero para una Chica Elfo," ha sido adaptada al cómic. Comienza la historia de un tramposo de clase S reencarnado en otro mundo con un toque de amor erótico.

altTitles.en: Oda and Akechi

altTitles.ja: 織田ちゃんと明智くん

description.es-la: Akechi Ryunosuke, el chico más rebelde de la escuela, y Oda Maria, la idol más querida, jamás imaginaron que sus mundos opuestos podrían unirse. Sin embargo, después de que Akechi confiesa sus sentimientos, comienzan una inesperada relación. Pero durante su primer beso, un impactante recuerdo del incendio del Templo Honnouji invade sus mentes... ¡Comienza así una electrizante vida escolar, donde el amor y el rencor de vidas pasadas se mezclan en una historia apasionante y llena de misterio!

altTitles.ja: ネタキャラ転生とかあんまりだ! THE COMIC

altTitles.en: Did I Seriously Just Get Reincarnated as My Gag Character?!

altTitles.ru: Мне кажется, или это похоже на реинкарнацию сюжетного персонажа?

altTitles.id: Gila sih, reinkarnasi jadi karakter lawak!

description.en:
Toru Aikawa, a college student who spends his days immersing himself in games because his daily life is so boring, was standing alone in a forest in a different world before he even could realize why. Moreover, it seems that he has reincarnated into the "Neta character" he made in a game. The Genderswap reincarnation of the strongest heroine packed with overflowing Chuunibyo and ideals!

The strongest genderswap reincarnation fantasy begins here !!

---

**Note:** A Neta character is a character whose action has captured the hearts of viewers and players and has been turned into a important part of the story.
description.id:
Toru Aikawa, seorang mahasiswa yang menghabiskan hari-harinya dalam permainan karena kesehariannya yang membosankan. ketika dia menyadarinya, dia sedang berdiri sendirian di hutan di dunia yang berbeda karena suatu alasan.. Selain itu, sepertinya dia telah bereinkarnasi ke dalam "karakter baru" yang dibuat dari bermain game….

bereinkarnasi menjadi yang terkuat yang dengan Chuunibyo yang meluap-luap dan juga cita-citanya!
description.pt-br:
Toru Aikawa, um estudante universitário que passa seus dias mergulhando em jogos porque sua vida diária é tão chata, estava sozinho em uma floresta em um mundo diferente antes que ele pudesse perceber o porquê. Além disso, parece que ele reencarnou no "personagem Neta" que ele fez em um jogo. A reencarnação Genderswap(troca de gênero) da heroína mais forte repleta de Chuunibyo transbordante e ideais!

A fantasia de reencarnação de troca de gênero mais forte começa aqui!

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Sibling Relationship 4-Koma
A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

description.en:
There are two kinds of people with special abilities: villains, who are driven by their evil desires, and psykers, who pursue justice and work against villains.

Cassian Lee is a very powerful psyker with a good heart. But one day, when he visits his friend in Greece, things take a wrong turn. Following an unexpected chain of events, Cassian ends up in the body of a Korean high school boy... who has just become a villain! 

Will his sense of justice win in the end or will he end up becoming a cold-blooded villain?
description.pl: Są dwa rodzaje ludzi ze specjalnymi zdolnościami: złoczyńcy - napędzani są swoimi złymi pragnieniami oraz psykerzy, którzy dążą do sprawiedliwości i walczą przeciwko złoczyńcom. Cassian Lee jest bardzo potężnym psykerem z dobrym sercem. Pewnego dnia, gdy odwiedza swojego przyjaciela w Grecji sprawy obierają zły kierunek. Po nieoczekiwanym łańcuchu zdarzeń, Cassian kończy w ciele koreańskiego licealisty... który właśnie stał się złoczyńcą! Koniec końców wygra jego poczucie sprawiedliwości czy jednak skończy jako bezlitosny złoczyńca?
description.es-la: "¡Debes convertirte en el mayor mal para luchar contra el mal real!" Kasian muere tras ser incriminado por el asesinato de un compañero. Justo cuando pensaba que todo había terminado para él, su alma se transfiere a un niño ... ¡Un psíquico popular y de primera clase que era la envidia de todos se convierte en un villano de la noche a la mañana!

altTitles.ja: 異世界もう帰りたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Go Back Home.

description.en:
Ordinary salaryman X isekai = a dispirited life in another world!?
He worked normally, ate normally, and slept normally. Salaryman Shimoyamaguchi Ichirou was satisfied with his simple but happy everyday life.
One day, he was summoned to another world to fight as a hero, but was as well received as a 1-star character pulled in a gacha game...
"Ugh, I just want to go home..."
Which way will tomorrow lead Shimoyamaguchi!?
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマン×異世界=しょんぼり転生…!?
普通に働き、普通にご飯を食べ、普通に寝る。そんな平凡なハッピーで物足りた日常を過ごすサラリーマン・下山口一郎。
ある日突然、英雄として異世界に召喚されたけど、評価は★1つのハズレガチャ扱い……。
「嗚呼、もう帰りたい……」下山口の明日はどっちだ──!?

title.en: The Blue Eye of Horus: The Story of a Queen Dressed as a Man

altTitles.it: La Regina d'Egitto: l'occhio azzurro di Horus

altTitles.pl: Oko Horusa: Kobieta, która została faraonem

altTitles.ja-ro: Aoi Horus no Hitomi: Dansou no Joou no Monogatari

altTitles.ja: 碧いホルスの瞳 -男装の女王の物語-

altTitles.zh: 碧蓝的荷鲁斯之眼~男装女王物语~

altTitles.zh-hk: 碧藍的荷魯斯之眼~男裝女王物語~

description.en:
It's the beginning of a new era in the Egypt of pharaohs, the marriage of the young Hatshepsut to her half-brother Seti ensures his rise to Pharaoh, under the name of Thutmose II.

Ambassadors of the gods on Earth, they shine to their people and seem at first glance like the perfect couple. However, under her mask of a perfect wife, Hatshepsut hides a deep rage… She doesn't want to accept the restrictions others try to place on her as a woman, she wants to become the Pharaoh, like her father!  
 
---

*Loosely based on the actual [historical figure](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hatshepsut).*

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

altTitles.ja: 彼女たちは穴をうめたい
They want to fill in the holes.

altTitles.en: They Want to Fill in the Holes

description.en: “Whom will you go out with?” Those were the words Doumoto Genki was confronted with on his first day of high school.  Now he has to figure out which one of the “out of this world” beauties he wants to date!
description.ja: 体が丈夫なことが取り柄である主人公・弦貴。高校に入学することを機に、新たな出会いに胸を膨らませていたところ、突然2人の美少女・カリンと聖から告白される！ そんな彼女たちの目的は彼とドッキングすることだった…!! ドッキングとは一体何か。ドッキングで何ができるのか。そして彼女たちは何者なのか…!?
description.pt-br: **”Com quem você vai sair?”** Essas foram as palavras com as quais Doumoto Genki foi confrontado no seu primeiro dia na escola secundária. Agora ele tem que descobrir qual das belezas “de outro mundo” ele quer namorar!

Minecraft: Anime Edition
Mines & Monster Girls

description.en: Minecraft enemies re-imagined as Waifus.
description.ru:
Враги из Майнкрафта стали аниме-девушками вайфу.

altTitles.en: Bamboo Samurai

altTitles.ja: 竹光侍

description.en:
Early one New Year's morning, the rounin Senou Souichirou appears in Edo's Katagi tenements.  
  
Initially, the inhabitants regard him with fear and suspicion: Kankichi, the carpenter's son, thinks he may not be human; the neighborhood cats remark that he reeks of blood. But soon Souichirou pawns his sword, and, with a bamboo replica at his waist, settles down to a quiet life as the neighborhood school-teacher.  
  
Months pass, and all appears to be well. But trouble will not leave the Katagi tenements alone …  
  
---
- **Won the 15th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2011**

title.en: I Became A College Professor At 14 Years Old, Because I'm A Genius

altTitles.ja: 天才なので14歳で大学教授になりました

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensai Nanode 14-sai de Daigaku Kyouju ni Narimashita
Tensai Nanode Juuyonsai de Daigaku Kyouju ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 異世界転生トラック

description.en: A bizarre oneshot depicting the hardships and adventures of a isekai truck driver.
description.pt-br: Um one-shot bizarro retratando as dificuldades e aventuras de um motorista de caminhão do isekai.

altTitles.ja: 異世界トラック

title.en: Haikei, Tengoku no Neesan, Yuusha ni Natta Mei ga Ero Sugite ーー Ojisan, Hogosha Toka Sorosoro Muri Desu+

altTitles.ja: 拝啓、天国の姉さん、勇者になった姪がエロすぎてーー 叔父さん、保護者とかそろそろ無理です＋（ぷらす）

altTitles.ja-ro: Haikei, Tengoku no Neesan, Yuusha ni Natta Mei ga Ero Sugite Ojisan, Hogosha Toka Sorosoro Muri Desu

altTitles.en: Dear Big Sister in Heaven, My Niece Who Became the Hero Is Too Erotic. Signed, Her Uncle. Being Something like Her Guardian Will Soon Be Impossible for Me+

description.es-la: Un antiguo mercenario de los más fuertes, fue herido y se retiró, luego su prometida huyó y ahora pasa los días bebiendo como un aventurero de mediana edad (virgen). Entonces su sobrina Liz, a la que una vez enseñó esgrima, aparece para visitarle. Ahora angel está confundido por cómo se ha convertido en una chica impresionantemente bella, pero Liz ha declarado que se casará con él sin importarle sus sentimientos... ¡Una emocionante fantasía de aventuras en muchos sentidos, tejida por una bella heroína y un tío de mediana edad!

title.en: Genkaigoe no Skill wa, Tenseisha ni Shika Atsukaenai - Over Limit Skill Holder

altTitles.ja: 限界超えの天賦は、転生者にしか扱えない ― オーバーリミット・スキルホルダー

altTitles.en: Over Limit Skill Holder: Only the Reincarnated can Conquer the "Over Limited Skill Orb"

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生者才能駕馭的極限天賦 —Over Limit Skill Holder—

description.en:
A fantasy adventure about bonds forged with people in a different world. The setting is a world, where everyone has eight skill slots. In these slots people can put skills like “Strengthen arm ★” and “Fire Magic★★” from skill orbs, abilities which prove extremely useful for survival. The total amount of stars your skills have can never exceed your slots. Our protagonist Reiji, worked as a slave that mines skill orbs, until 10 years old. Along with his precious older sister, Lark, they worked gruellingly in the mines until one day, where the chance for rebellion occurred at the mine and Reiji got his hands on a ten-star, a so called “overlimit” skill, called “World Ruler”. Reiji went from a powerless slave to having an ability that surpassed human limits, but in the chaos of the revolt, he was separated from the only person dear to him, his sister Lark.  
  
“To regain his bond with her, to make her his true sister”, earnestly thinking so, Reiji’s adventure to distant places starts!

---

**Note:** The chapter number resets after each arc.

description.ja:
"契約魔術"によって拘束され、鉱山で奴隷として働かされていた10歳の少年・レイジ。姉貴分の少女奴隷・ラルクと共に"天賦珠玉（スキルオーブ）"を採掘するだけの人生を送っていた彼は、鉱山で起こった暴動をきっかけに"あらゆる事象を一瞬で理解"し、さらには"他者のスキルをコピー"できるという最強の感知＆ラーニングスキル【森羅万象（ワールド・ルーラー）】を入手。同時に自身が元々17歳の高校生であり、事故死から蘇った異世界転生者であることを知った。

レイジはスキルの力を活かして鉱山を脱出するものの、たった一人の仲間だったラルクと決別してしまう。いつかラルクと再会し、本当の姉弟になることを胸に誓って――レイジの果てしない冒険が始まる!!

altTitles.ja: 終末の花嫁様 -sweet home†melty life-

altTitles.en: Apocalypse Bride ~sweet home†melty life~

description.en: Michiru, born under his extremely religious mother, believes that one day an angel would come down and save him from his suffering and pain. After getting severely bruised and beaten up from the kids at his school, his nextdoor neighbor, Hikari, comes to his aide and carries him to her home. While Michiru is asleep, she rampages the world, destroying everything. When he awakes, it is revealed to him that Hikari is an angel. Michiru asks Hikari to marry him, which she gladly accepts. Will their sudden post-apocalypse and newlywed life give Michiru what he always wanted? Or is there more to it under the surface?
description.id:
"Tolong... Menikahlah denganku!"

Michiru, seorang anak laki-laki yang tidak memiliki "tempat tinggal" baik di rumah maupun di sekolah.
Hikari, onee-san kikuk yang merupakan tetangga dari Michiru.
Sebuah proposal tiba-tiba dibuat.

Setitik cahaya yang muncul di tengah-tengah keseharian yang menyakitkan dan melelahkan.
Di tengah keseharian itu, dunia mengalami kehancuran.

Sebuah keseharian pasutri antara seorang bocah dan malaikat dimulai!

(Sumber sinopsis : Amazon)
description.ja:
「私と…結婚してください！」

家にも学校にも居場所がない少年・みちるは、近所に住むうっかりやのお姉さん・ひかりに突然プロポーズされる。苦しくて、退屈な毎日の中で唯一の光。そんなある日、世界が滅んでしまって――

description.en: The story revolves around people who possess the ability to infiltrate human minds and manipulate memories. Their powers have been used in the underworld for covering up accidents, assassinations, and all manner of crimes. But these powers not only destroy others' spirits, but also corrupt the users' own hearts…

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

altTitles.en: An Ordinary Light Music Club

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

title.en: Ane ga Kensei de Imouto ga Kenja de

altTitles.zh: 姐姐是剑圣妹妹是贤者

altTitles.ja: 姉が剣聖で妹が賢者で

altTitles.en: My Older Sister is a Sword Saint and My Younger Sister is a Sage

altTitles.ja-ro: Ane ga Kensei de Imouto ga Kenja de

description.en:
The Ralk Kingdom is a country of extreme meritocracy, but Razel, the son of the stupid king, has no talent for martial arts, and because he is always compared to his older sister who is a sword saint and his younger sister who is a sage, he gets banished from the kingdom. 

From then on, he tries to live as an adventurer in a different country, but his older and younger sisters, who love him dearly, come after him!? A lovey-dovey life of an adventurer with strong and slightly lewd sisters begins!
description.ja:
超実力主義国家、ラルク王国。その国王の息子でありながら武の才能がないラゼルは、剣聖の姉や賢者の妹と比べられ、追放されてしまう。
そんなラゼルは持ち前のポジティブさで、別の国で冒険者として生きていこうとするのだが、彼を溺愛するお姉ちゃんたちと妹が追ってきて!?
強くてちょっとエッチなお姉ちゃんたちとのイチャイチャ冒険者生活、スタート！
description.pt:
A superpoderosa nação de Ralk onde o poder determina tudo. Razel, que é o filho do rei, é exilado do país porque não tem talento para espada e magia em comparação com suas irmãs. Com pensamentos positivos, ele procura um país diferente para aprender a ser aventureiro e viver livremente, mas suas irmãs que o amam também o acompanham.   
  
Uma fantástica aventura com suas irmãs começa!

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

altTitles.ja: 火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

description.es-la: La serie sigue la vida diaria de una trabajadora de oficina llamada Kaoru y su marido otaku, que vive prácticamente en un gran foro de Internet.

altTitles.ja: fish -フィッシュ-

altTitles.en: Fish

description.en:
There exist humans who can crawl into the memories of others and manipulate them to their advantage. “The company”, a system that succeeds in merge and acquisition deals, owes its rapid growth to the misuse of said abilities, but an attack by rebels of the same kind makes the plot thicken.

“Even if I’ve lost my memories, can I still be myself?” A psychological suspense drenched in blood and tears.

--------------------------------------------

Fish is the sequel to Pet, a manga by the same author, and its translation isn't complete yet but there's an anime that covers Pet fully.

I strongly recommend knowing Pet's story before reaching Fish's 3rd volume!

title.en: Dai San Ouji wa Slow Life o Goshomou

altTitles.ja: 第3王子はスローライフをご所望

altTitles.en: Dai 3 Ouji wa Slow Life wo Goshomou

description.es-la: ¡En mi primer intento, fui aplastado como un caballo tirado por caballos como animal de compañía!? La vida era fugaz y corta. Pero afortunadamente reencarnado!　Obtuve una habilidad mágica similar a la de un tramposo en la batalla, me convertí en un héroe al exterminar al rey demonio ...... Como resultado, fue aplastado con más dureza. La diosa vino ante mí así ¡Finalmente decidí vivir mi tercera vida! Magia y tecnología en la vida anterior, heredé el conocimiento, ¡disfrute de la vida lenta y despreocupada en el territorio fronterizo! Ojalá pudiera pasar esta vida tranquilamente rodeado de gente amable (¿no es una bandera?)
